verses.text: \w In|strong="H0935"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* Ezechias \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Isaias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amos|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Take|strong="H0935"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Isaias, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H2396"\w* \w writing|strong="H4385"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w when|strong="H2421"\w* \w he|strong="H2483"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* been \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* recovered \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H2396"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w*. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* rest.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w or|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, whereas \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*? \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* recount \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
